nml_option.name: config_ziso_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in ziso. Typical value is 100.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_add_easterly_wind_stress_ASF
nml_option.description: Logical flag to determine if an easterly windstress is added

nml_option.name: config_ziso_wind_transition_position
nml_option.description: meridional position where windstress switches to easterly
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real number, less than config_ziso_meridional_extent

nml_option.name: config_ziso_antarctic_shelf_front_width
nml_option.description: meridional extent over which the easterly wind stress is applied
nml_option.possible_values: any positive real number less than the meridional domain extent

nml_option.name: config_ziso_wind_stress_shelf_front_max
nml_option.description: Maximum zonal windstress value in the shelf front region, following Stewart et al. 2013

nml_option.name: config_ziso_use_slopping_bathymetry
nml_option.description: Logical flag that determines if sloping bathymetery is used.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_meridional_extent
nml_option.description: Meridional extent of the domain ($L$).
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than zero.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_zonal_extent
nml_option.description: Zonal extent of the domain ($W$).
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than zero.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_bottom_depth
nml_option.description: Depth of the domain ($H$).
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than zero.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_shelf_depth
nml_option.description: Shelf depth in the domain ($H_s$).

nml_option.name: config_ziso_slope_half_width
nml_option.description: Shelf half width ($W_s$).

nml_option.name: config_ziso_slope_center_position
nml_option.description: Slope center posiiton ($Y_s$).

nml_option.name: config_ziso_reference_coriolis
nml_option.description: Reference coriolis parameter $f_0$. Note $f = f_0 + \beta * y$.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_coriolis_gradient
nml_option.description: Meridional gradient of coriolis parameter $\beta$.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_wind_stress_max
nml_option.description: Maximum zonal windstress value in $\tau(y) = \tau_0 \exp\left[-\left(\frac{y-L/2}{L/2}\right)^2\right]\cos\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\frac{y-L/2}{L/2}right)$.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_mean_restoring_temp
nml_option.description: Mean restoring temperature $T_m$ in $T_r(y) = T_m + T_a \tanh\left(2\frac{y-L/2}{L/2}\right) + T_b \frac{y-L/2}{L/2}$.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_restoring_temp_dev_ta
nml_option.description: Temperature deviation $T_a$ in surface temp. $T_r(y) = T_m + T_a \tanh\left(2\frac{y-L/2}{L/2}\right) + T_b \frac{y-L/2}{L/2}$.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_restoring_temp_dev_tb
nml_option.description: Linear temperature deviation $T_b$ in surface temp. $T_r(y) = T_m + T_a \tanh\left(2\frac{y-L/2}{L/2}\right) + T_b \frac{y-L/2}{L/2}$.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_restoring_temp_tau
nml_option.description: Time scale for interior restoring of temperature.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_restoring_temp_piston_vel
nml_option.description: Restoring piston velocity for surface temperature.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_restoring_temp_ze
nml_option.description: Vertical $e-$folding scale in $T_s$ for northern wall: $T_s \exp(z/z_e)$.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_restoring_sponge_l
nml_option.description: E-folding distance parameter for the sponge vertical temperature profile.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_initial_temp_t1
nml_option.description: Initial temperature profile constant $T_1$ in $T(z,t=0) = T_1 + T_2 \tanh(z/h_1) + m_T z$.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_initial_temp_t2
nml_option.description: Initial temperature profile constant $T_2$ in $T(z,t=0) = T_1 + T_2 \tanh(z/h_1) + m_T z$.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_initial_temp_h1
nml_option.description: Initial temperature profile constant $h_1$ in $T(z,t=0) = T_1 + T_2 \tanh(z/h_1) + m_T z$.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_initial_temp_mt
nml_option.description: Initial temperature profile constant $m_T$ in $T(z,t=0) = T_1 + T_2 \tanh(z/h_1) + m_T z$.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_frazil_enable
nml_option.description: A logical to overload (and largely overwrite) this test case to evaluate frazil. In almost all uses of this test case, this configure option should be false.

nml_option.name: config_ziso_frazil_temperature_anomaly
nml_option.description: Temperature anomaly to produce frazil
